extendedInfo.description: Today's English word from Merriam-Webster dictionary. You can practice your English word pronunciation with Google voice. Listen explanation of the English word from the podcast. Share meaning of English words with friends. Translation also supported. Home screen widget available.Could be a useful tool for English learners.### OLD VERSION was released by the name of "Today's Word" ###** Update HistoryDownload error fixedQuiz feature added : solve 10 random problems from downloaded word list.Quiz feature added : solve 10 random problems from downloaded word list.Socialize feature addedCrash in upgrading task fixed.Push message related crash fixedSocial service removed because it has problem on some devicesBlack screen at startup probably fixedUnnecessary permission revoked "SMS receive"App wholly renovated with jellybean user interface.Tablet support in landscape mode.Avoid blank displayed on some devices, please run a few times if it does the same.Crash after press word in widget fixed.Re-sizable and Key-guard widget support.Definition is part of widget.Support blue, light, gray widget.Users can search words in word list.

reviews.title: Update fail.
reviews.comment: Also plagued by the widget force closes. And the new widget sucks, even if I expand it, can still only see the word and pronunciation. Worthless. Not a good update
reviews.author: Andrew Gracen

reviews.title: Didactic
reviews.comment: This is didactic AND addicting! I\'m always trying to expand my vocabulary and this app is fun because it has a game to quiz you on the words. great free app
reviews.author: Stratton Brown

reviews.comment: This is a cool app. It tells you one word for a day and then you figure out what it means or the definition.......:)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool deal
reviews.comment: some bugs but overall really nice to have some words I  doesn\'t even know. hahaha
reviews.author: Robert Brewer

reviews.title: This app sucks.
reviews.comment: It won\'t ever open, and the widget only updates half the time. Don\'t download. Reports sent to fix the app do not get it repaired.
reviews.author: Anna Knowles

reviews.comment: good apps! easy to learn English
reviews.author: bass katrina

reviews.title: Yo
reviews.comment: Nice app.! Cool
reviews.author: raja kafaliya

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: The only problem it\'s got is that sometimes it doesn\'t update the new word automatically
reviews.author: crovansci narfaro

reviews.title: Thanks for the update!
reviews.comment: Said I would definitely download again once fixed & I did. Widget Colour options too! Thanks a heap!
reviews.author: Flo R

reviews.title: Liked the earlier version more
reviews.comment: Good collection of Merriam Webster word a day content. Very convenient to find all the previous day words at one place. Along with the audio podcast.
reviews.author: Nimish Pandey

reviews.title: If it isn\'t broke, do not fix it.
reviews.comment: Worked fine, until the recent update - changed everything.  My guess is, got greedy with sponsorship.  I simply want to look at my phone to see the word AND DEFINITION!  I DO NOT WANT TO HAVE TO OPEN THE APP AND WAIT FOR IT, SIMPLY TO SEE THE DEFINITION.
reviews.author: D.L. C.

reviews.title: crap now
reviews.comment: I like to see the word\'s meaning on my homepage. Latest update is annoying. I will uninstall it now..
reviews.author: Ash Mason

reviews.title: Nice idea but crashes constantly
reviews.comment: The application is crashing 8 out of 10 times i am trying to open it.(nexus 4 )
reviews.author: Alex Keselman

reviews.comment: It was great till this last update and now I don\'t get any new words and stopped letting me update after
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Update made worse!!
reviews.comment: Thank you for fixing!!!!! Please make a scrollable feature so we can view the whole definition from the home screen.
reviews.author: Matt Jones

reviews.title: Newest update
reviews.comment: Thank you for fixing bug.
reviews.author: Richard Bermudez

reviews.title: Review revision
reviews.comment: I had said it does what it says but after having it for a few days I realise I was wrong. You don\'t get a new word daily although you do get notifications daily saying they have new episodes but when I look there are just the same words the quiz is cool but I would like a word a day as promised
reviews.author: Kelly Clark

reviews.title: Tedious
reviews.comment: No option to download all episodes at once.
reviews.author: Marcin Green

reviews.title: Mediocre
reviews.comment: The widget is unattractive and doesn\'t show much information about the word. The app itself is buggy but it works. Overall, the basics of the app are functional, but it could look better and be smoother.
reviews.author: Logan Daniels

reviews.title: Lay off of the drugs
reviews.comment: Seriously, what were you thinking when you decided to update this app? Not only does the widget look worse, but it doesn\'t even open properly on my Note 2 like it used to prior to this horrible update. You developers that make apps for the Android platform seriously need to knock it off at making once excellent apps completely useless. Sad.
reviews.author: Bahb Jahnssin
